titleStmt.title: Chippenham, Wiltshire and Swindon History Centre, MS 1230/1

msItem.title: Magna carta with statutes; tracts; Seneschaucy and Walter of Henley, On Husbandry; register of writs

history.provenance: Provenance: ‘This book belongeth to the Chamber of Marlebroughe’, 16th c., ff. iv and viiv; Roger Mostyn (d. 1739); Thomas Mostyn; sold in the Mostyn Hall Library sale at Christie’s, 24 Oct. 1974; Wiltshire Record Office, Trowbridge.

listBibl.bibl: Bibliography: MLGB, suppl., p. 49; E. G. H. Kempson, ‘A Marlborough Books of Statutes’, Wiltshire Archaeological Magazine 70/71 (1978), pp. 99–103; MMBL, IV, pp. 497–501.

body.p:
Chippenham, Wiltshire and Swindon History Centre
MS 1230/1. Magna carta with statutes; tracts; Seneschaucy and Walter of Henley, On Husbandry; register of writs. i + 338 + i ff. 217 x 143 mm. Text block 150 x 85–8 mm.
Provenance: ‘This book belongeth to the Chamber of Marlebroughe’, 16th c., ff. iv and viiv; Roger Mostyn (d. 1739); Thomas Mostyn; sold in the Mostyn Hall Library sale at Christie’s, 24 Oct. 1974; Wiltshire Record Office, Trowbridge.
Bibliography: MLGB, suppl., p. 49; E. G. H. Kempson, ‘A Marlborough Books of Statutes’, Wiltshire Archaeological Magazine 70/71 (1978), pp. 99–103; MMBL, IV, pp. 497–501.
